Date: 2012-03-13, 9:00AM EDT
Reply to: wtsb8-2866365798@hous.craigslist.org [Errors when replying to ads?]

Perfect Downtown Location!

Beautiful Bachelor Suites, at $805/month & electricity!

Located amongst the Fashion District of Queen St. W. (Richmond & Niagara).

- Walking distance to all amenities including, 24 hour convenience stores, coffee shops, boutiques, spas, restaurants and grocery stores.
- Walking distance to the entertainment district, Kensington Market, Chinatown etc.
- Queen streetcar (24hr), King streetcar and Bathurst streetcar accessible.
- Beautiful courtyard
- Laundry facilities on site
- Free Wireless Internet in Study Room
- Rent includes the use of Billiards Room, Party Room, Gym, Sauna and Hot Tub.
- Underground Parking Available ($125/month)

For more information, please contact our Rental Office at 416-504-4048!
